fullText: This affectionate tribute to the legendary producer-director Hal Prince is a slick, professionally assembled entertainment that will please devotees while providing newcomers with a solid primer on one of Broadway's most important figures.
dtliExcerpt: This affectionate tribute to the legendary producer-director Hal Prince is a slick, professionally assembled entertainment that will please devotees while providing newcomers with a solid primer on one of Broadway's most important figures.
bwwExcerpt: Imagine simultaneous revivals of a dozen or so of the standout musical productions of the latter half of the 20th century. That's more or less what Prince of Broadway crams into two-and-a-half hours, in sample-size nuggets that touch on the magic while leaving you craving more. Sifting through such an embarrassment of riches, it's inevitable that certain choices and omissions appear questionable, and the nine performers that make up the tremendously versatile and hard-working ensemble are a bett
